# Project 08: VSCode Extension

Test VSCode extension integration and debugging features.

## Purpose
Test the FlowMason VSCode extension:
- Extension installation
- File support (.pipeline.json)
- Debugging capabilities
- Commands

## Time Required
~1 hour

## Prerequisites
- VSCode installed
- FlowMason extension installed (.vsix)
- Studio running for debug connection

## Installation

```bash
code --install-extension vscode-extension/flowmason-X.Y.Z.vsix
```

## Test Areas

### 8.1 Extension Installation
- Install from .vsix
- Extension activation
- Settings configuration

### 8.2 File Support
- Syntax highlighting
- JSON validation
- IntelliSense

### 8.3 Debugging
- Launch configuration
- Breakpoints
- Step execution
- Variables inspection

### 8.4 Commands
- Command palette integration
- Run/validate pipelines

## Note
This project requires direct interaction with VSCode. Use the CHECKLIST.md to track manual testing progress.
